thread.section_title: Official Car Mats Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Official Car Mats | officialcarmats.co.uk | 5 of 197
thread.title: Mr Kevin Evans
thread.title_full: Official Car Mats reviewed by Mr Kevin Evans

author: Mr Kevin Evans
title: Mr Kevin Evans
text:
Excellent quality car mats that fitted perfectly, exactly the right shape and even had the drivers mat press studs accurately aligned to anchor to the floor. The service from Becky on their website chat app was second to none. She was very courteous and knowledgeable on the companies products. The old mats in my car were supposedly made for the particular model I have but were of a questionable quality and a very bad fit. Becky asked me what exact make, model, and year etc. and gave me all the information I needed to order the correct mats, spot on! I would highly recommend this company.
Kind Regards
Mr Kevin L Evans
